title: What will the total KCET fees for PES come out to be?
content: On the KEA website, the fee for pvt unaided colleges is given as 76k. So when PES adds it's university fee and all the extras, what will the total be?

comments.body: Around 1-1.2 lakh if you are general category
Do we've to pay that extra University fee every single year or just in the first year?
this fee is total (kcet + college fees)  or only college fees ??
>this fee is total (kcet + college fees)  or only college fees ??
this year, the kcet fee itself is 96k
for our batch fees was 62k, 50k miscellaneous fee, hence 112k
